### IPromptPlusConfig.SwitchWidth property
</br>


#### Gets Sets the width of the Progress bar.Default value is 6. Valid range is 6–255; values outside the range are coerced to the nearest boundary.

```csharp
public byte SwitchWidth { get; set; }
```
